meanings.definition: A person or company that exports goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The exporters shipped the products overseas.
meanings.sent2: Many exporters sell their goods to different countries.
meanings.sent3: The exporters were like busy bees buzzing around the globe.
meanings.sent4: In the world of trade, exporters are the bridge between nations.
meanings.sent5: The success of exporters relies on international demand for their products.

meanings.definition: The act of exporting goods or services to another country.
meanings.sent1: Global trade depends on the efficiency of exporters.
meanings.sent2: The government encourages exporters to boost the economy.
meanings.sent3: The competition among exporters was like a friendly race around the world.
meanings.sent4: The growth of technology has revolutionized the way exporters conduct business.
meanings.sent5: Exporters play a crucial role in connecting markets across borders.
